scheme_name: Grant-in-Aid to Industrial Association, CII, Industrial NGOs for Promotion of SME Clusters
description: This scheme in Puducherry provides grants to industrial associations, CII, and NGOs to promote SME clusters. It supports activities like marketing, technology upgradation, and skill development to enhance the competitiveness of SMEs.
key_features: Support for marketing and technology upgradation

benefits.grant: Up to Rs. 10 Lakhs per cluster for approved activities
benefits.technical_support: Access to expert guidance and training

organization_criteria: Registered industrial associations, CII, or NGOs in Puducherry
Must have experience in SME promotion
activity_criteria: Proposed activities must benefit SME clusters
Must align with Puducherryâ€™s industrial policy

eligible_activities: Marketing and promotional activities for SME clusters
Technology upgradation and skill development programs
Organizing workshops, seminars, and trade fairs

steps: Obtain the application form from the Department of Industries and Commerce, Puducherry
Submit a detailed proposal with cluster development activities
Attach required documents, including organization registration and activity plan
Applications are reviewed by the Industries Department
Approved organizations receive grants in phases
application_process.note: Progress reports are required for subsequent funding

required_documents.document: Proof of Past SME Promotion Activities

special_notes: Grants are disbursed based on project milestones
Activities must directly benefit SME clusters
Organizations must comply with reporting requirements
